tika-s0404t23:2_6: Yathā micchādiṭṭhi vipassanāya nijjiṇṇāpi na samucchinnāti samucchedappahānadassanatthaṁ puna gahitā,
tika-s0404t23:2_7: evaṁ micchāsaṅkappādayopi vipassanāya pahīnāpi asamucchinnatāya idha puna gahitāti ayamattho “micchāsaṅkappassā”tiādīsu
tika-s0404t23:2_8: sabbapadesu vattabboti dasseti “evaṁ sabbapadesu yojetabbo”ti iminā.
tika-s0404t23:2_9: Ettha cāti “sammāvimuttipaccayā ca aneke kusalā dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchantī”ti etasmiṁ pāḷipade.
tika-s0404t23:2_10: Ettha ca samucchedavasena ca paṭippassaddhivasena ca paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ sammadeva vimuccanaṁ sammāvimutti.
tika-s0404t23:2_11: Tappaccayā ca maggaphalesu aṭṭha indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ upagacchantīti maggasampayuttānipi saddhādīni indriyāni uddhaṭāni.
tika-s0404t23:2_14: Idañhi somanassindriyaṁ ukkaṁsagatasātasabhāvato sampayuttadhamme sinehantaṁ tementaṁ viya pavattati.
